ai-ya1.2.1:1.0.1_0: I am not able to persuade (it) with a good deed,

ai-ya1.2.1:5.1_0: the skillful root of the skillful, not with the root of the skillful.

ai-ya1.2.1:6.1_0: Whatever are wholesome roots with the wholesome root, are they all wholesome roots?
